EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Modern Component Design with Spring 7AM.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Modern Component Design with Spring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for Modern Component Design with Spring and Juergen Hoeller. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Thursday, October 24, 2013 Europe: 3:00pm GMT Summer (London, GMT+01:00) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=667997480> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 667 997 480
Thank you,
